question: What version of the Internet Protocol is IPv4?

answers: To identify a specific host within a network
To identify a group of hosts on the same network
To deliver data to the receiver

question: Which analogy is used to describe the Network ID in the presentation?
What is the role of the Host ID?
answers: To forward packets to the destination network
To deliver data to the receiver within the destination network

answers: The number of bits used for the network ID
The number of usable host addresses
